== Basic Search ==

To search for unanswered posts, you can follow these steps:
* Go to the main page of the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/|Ubuntu Forums]]</nowiki>
* Click the link '''Quick Links''' on the right of the screen, above the threads. It will open a drop-down list.
* Click '''Unanswered Posts''' in the drop-down list.

=== Advanced Search: ===
* Click the link '''Advanced Search''' on top of the screen (this is visible in any page of the forums). It will open a drop-down list.
* Under ''Additional Options'', there's a box '''Find Threads with'''. There you can select '''At Most''' in the drop-down list. In the text box right of the drop-down list, you can enter a '''0''' (this should be the default).
* Click the '''Search Now''' button at the bottom of the screen.
